law.text: The commissioner may promulgate reasonable rules and regulations not inconsistent with the provisions of this subtitle that he or she deems necessary for the proper administration of this subtitle.
law.history: Amended 2010 Ky. Acts ch. 24, sec. 1511, effective July 15, 2010. -- Amended 1986 Ky. Acts ch. 437, sec. 30, effective July 15, 1986. -- Created 1974 Ky. Acts ch. 357, subtit. 38, sec. 15, effective June 21, 1974.
